==Command==
The '''%''' command displays a general character overview that includes your current health, experience, money, gear, resistances, status effects, mutations, and abilities (the latter three more terse than with the command @, A, a). This is a highly condensed conglomeration of '''[''', '''"''', '''E''', '''^''', '''@''', '''A''', '''a''', and '''$''' on a single screen. Pressing the corresponding key of a displayed item views it directly.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.26]], the '''%''' symbol represented [[food]] and carrion.
